nodes.text: Tentrix was a vast, beautiful blue planet located within the Tentrix system of the Expansion Region.

It was to this planet that a young Anakin Skywalker, piloting a starship alongside fellow Jedi pilot Garen Muln, escorted the massive passenger liner BioCruiser after it had been torpedoed by battleships of Offworld Mining Corporation (UniFy), which was, ironically, also the dying transport's owner.
